changeSet.author: European Dynamics SA
changeSet.createView: SELECT a.id AS id, CONCAT(uafirst.data, ' ', ualast.data) AS userName, a.short_description as shortDescription, a.created_on as createdOn, c.COMPANY_NAME as companyName FROM al_audit a INNER JOIN SUB_COMPANY c ON c.id = a.reference_id INNER JOIN aaa_user u ON u.id = a.prin_session_id INNER JOIN aaa_user_attributes uafirst ON uafirst.user_id = u.id INNER JOIN aaa_user_attributes ualast ON ualast.user_id = u.id WHERE opt3='1' and reference_id in (select id from SUB_COMPANY) and group_name = 'COMPANY' and ualast.name = 'LASTNAME' and uafirst.name = 'FIRSTNAME';
